sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167150 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #ltrmCniSsfnnOrgnCd# , #ltrmCniSsFnnCmp# , #ltrmCniSsAccno# , #ltrmCniSsPymAmt# , #ltrmCniSsIncDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167150 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD=#ltrmCniSsfnnOrgnCd# , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP=#ltrmCniSsFnnCmp# , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO=#ltrmCniSsAccno# , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT=#ltrmCniSsPymAmt# , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT=#ltrmCniSsIncDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167150 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167150 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , LTRM_CNI_SSFNN_ORGN_CD , LTRM_CNI_SS_FNN_CMP , LTRM_CNI_SS_ACCNO , LTRM_CNI_SS_PYM_AMT , LTRM_CNI_SS_INC_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167150 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167150 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
